data.name: Nightfall Warriors: Hunt the supernatural with your companion
data.app_name: Nightfall Warriors: Hunt the supernatural with your companion
data.description:
Nightfall Warriors is a co-op oriented game (but solo mode is also available), where you fight supernatural monsters with your companion. You'll have a bunch of weapons, tools and abilities on your journey. Your companion can aid you by exploring the map, getting all the loot, giving you tools and usings their abilities. Play with your friends or familliy, or anyone in the world to hunt down evil.

DUO mode:
- Internet connection required
- Select Duo-mode in VR, a connection code will appear
- Install Nightfall Warriors Companion's app on your phone or tablet
- Start Nightfall Warriors on the Companion's phone or tablet
- Insert the connection code that is shown in VR
- Play!

SOLO mode:
- No internet connection required
- You will command your companion in VR to give you tools, or use it's abilities, or pick up loot
- Play!

We hope you will have fun time playing Nightfall Warriors!
